meanings.definition: Failure to attend or be present
meanings.sent1: The nonattendances at the meeting were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: Her nonattendances at work were becoming a concern.
meanings.sent3: The nonattendances of the main characters in the play led to a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The nonattendances of the stars in the sky made the night feel empty.
meanings.sent5: The nonattendances of the students made the classroom feel lonely.

meanings.definition: Absence from a scheduled event or meeting
meanings.sent1: The nonattendances of key members affected the outcome of the conference.
meanings.sent2: His repeated nonattendances at practice led to his removal from the team.
meanings.sent3: The nonattendances of the animals at the zoo made the visitors curious.
meanings.sent4: The nonattendances of the leaves on the tree created a beautiful pattern of light.
meanings.sent5: The nonattendances of the guests at the party left the host feeling disappointed.
